name: leafskin - Dryad embedding. Make people into wood spirits.
description: I couldn't find a way to get a model to do this natively so I created some sample images using the Art of MTG embedding. It's a model that knows what a dryad is. I made a subject textual inversion which is now capable of making green skin and leaf & vine textures. Add a pattern overlay to smooth skin in order to coax growth patterns.
